attributes.action: create a basic train station on the line in Preston (Paignton), Torbay
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe many people would travel on the morning train services from Paignton to Exeter, and indeed in general from Preston (Paignton) to Exeter on train services.Commuters would be further disinclined to use their cars and use the trains for a commute, as there is a significant walk from this part of town to the existing train station in the town centre.
